changeSet.createView: select * from ( select sid, eid, fname, day/*, to_char(to_date(day,'dd/mm/yyyy'), 'DAY') as weekday*/ from ( select * from schedule_template_view ) schtmp natural join ( select i.employee_id as eid, i.shift_id as sid, i.on_date as day from is_scheduled_for i ) scheduled natural join ( select e.id as eid, e.first_name as fname from employee e ) emp ) sch_hist_view order by day
